mapper.insert: INSERT INTO hk_member(name, id, email, phone, pw) VALUES(#{name}, #{id}, #{email}, #{phone}, #{pw})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM hk_member WHERE id=#{id} AND pw = #{pw}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM hk_member WHERE id=#{id} AND email = #{email}
SELECT id FROM hk_member WHERE name = #{name} AND email = #{email}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM hk_member WHERE id = #{id} AND email = #{email}
